articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Nothing launches AI tool for building mini apps using prompts - TechCrunch
articles.description: Nothing on Monday revealed Playground, an AI tool that lets users create apps with simple text prompts and deploy them to a platform of sorts known as Essential Apps.
articles.content: AI-powered app development is really taking off, and smartphone maker Nothing seems intent on capitalizing on the bandwagon: the company on Tuesday revealed Playground, an AI tool that lets users cre… [+3230 chars]

articles.title: Samsung Has Reportedly Kicked Off Mass Production Of Its Exynos 2600 On Its 2nm GAA Process, With Yields Jumping To 50 Percent - Wccftech
articles.description: A report states that the Exynos 2600 has officially entered mass production, with Samsung having boosted its yields to 50 percent
articles.content: The schedule mentioned in an earlier report that Samsung would kick off full-scale production of the Exynos 2600 in late September, and now that the month is nearly finished, we have stumbled upon a … [+2122 chars]
